name: My Bike
description:
Choose from one of three different motorcycle models and try it on the track!

The 3 bikes have different statistics, the Racer will allow you to go fast but will not be stable on rough terrain while on the contrary the Cross has less speed but will allow you to go on any terrain! A large, fully accessible map with a track and different stunt ramps to try out the performance of your car! Not to mention an excellent music playlist!



Features :

■ Three different motorcycle models!
■ A large, fully accessible map!
■ A track in the middle of the map!
■ A multitude of stunt ramps!
■ Transmission system and speedometer in km/h of the car!
■ Good music!
